EmailTemplate.description: User announcements for sprint 26 Dev release ( Account Hierarchy)
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Salesforce Changes 26 A
EmailTemplate.subject: PLEASE READ: Updates to Accounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
This week's release contains the new account hierarchy structure.
What is Account Hierarchy? Account hierarchy is the linking of an account to another account. Creating this relationship helps sales reps manage accounts. We have created 3 account types. Billing accounts, Sales accounts and Organization accounts.
Check out this overview video https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Z76VyT1g0tAM16mRbOfWcdgOpH-w8rAj/view?usp=sharing
Billing Account: An account that represents a billing entity
Contains UUID Contains Primary Member Syncs with Billing systems and Spacestation Can send paperwork Billing accounts can also be represented by blank values, which indicates no previously signed contract
Sales Account: An account that represents an entity that exists as a regional, business division, or subsidiary
Can not send paperwork Does not sync with billing systems and space station Created and managed by sales operation leads Generally owned enterprise and member success reps
Organization Account: An account that represents the top of the hierarchy. This is the senior parent account and controls the relationship of the structure.
Can not send paperwork Does not sync with billing systems and space station Auto Parented based on Unomy enrichment Manually Parented through the account selector or account record
Check out our other feature videos related to this release How to create a billing account for an opportunity https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hD69gdwarZTRLd1f8uaiRVEJ2IF-THTy/view?usp=sharing How to search and identify different accounts relationships in Salesforce https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SgNh4r_VwuGvmS1raPIzplPUbdd7U6El/view?usp=sharing
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
Sincerely Tykira
